front.title: The Model Primary Content Type for Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions

abstract.t: The purpose of this Internet Draft is to propose an update to Internet RFC 1521 to include a new primary content-type to be Internet RFC 1521 to include a new primary content-type to be known as 'model'. RFC 1521[1] describes mechanisms for specifying and describing the format of Internet Message Bodies via content-type/subtype pairs. We believe that 'model' defines a fundamental type of content with unique presentational, hardware, and processing aspects. Various subtypes of this primary type are immediately anticipated but will be covered under separate documents.
